DOC.brief_summary: Background : Tension Type Headache ( TTH ) highly frequent great socio-economic importance . Andersen et al . 2008 show maximal muscle strength reduce woman trapezius myalgia . It show specific strength training lead prolonged pain relief . Aim : Test : To investigate impact TTH shoulder , neck muscle strength patient TTH compare healthy control . Intervention : To investigate effect specific strength training patient TTH compare control group , receive training ergonomics . Method : Test part . 60 tension headache patient , 30 healthy . Muscle test neck shoulder . Testing conduct blind research assistant . Intervention group : 60 patient tension headache randomly assign intervention group control group . Intervention specific strength training program run 10 week . The control group train ergonomics . 3 month follow .
DOC.brief_title: Muscle Strength Shoulder Neck Muscles Tension Type Headache Patients . Effect Specific Strength Training
DOC.criteria: Tensiontype headache ( TTH ) , inclusion criterion age 18 65 year patient diagnosis TTH ≥8 headache day per month , ≤3 migraine day per month accord ICHDII criterion . Exclusion criterion medication overuse headache ( ICHDII ) , previous whiplash head trauma , major physical neurological disease , depression , mental illness , unable understand speak Danish . The patient test cervicogenic headache accord Jull , et al 2007 , exclude test positive .
